title: Participatory Prenatal and Childbirth Education Workshop Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Pedagogical Knowledge and Language Education Experience
context.additional_context: Project-based learning course for pre-service/in-service teachers to study prenatal and childbirth education principles and practices, operated in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain core concepts of prenatal and childbirth education (e.g., childbirth process, birth plan creation)
Learners can design and execute participant-centered workshop activities
Learners can develop and utilize effective educational materials in limited technological environments
Learners can complete a project evaluating educational effectiveness through small-group activities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
